snippet: Speaking at a police academy in Colorado, President Obama asked rural gun owners and urban mothers to imagine having the opposite perspective on the need for weapons and the damage they can do.
abstract: President Obama, speaking at a police academy in Colorado, asks for understanding from opposing forces of gun control debate; asks rural gun owners and urban mothers to imagine having the opposite perspective on the need for weapons and the damage they can do.
lead_paragraph: Speaking at a police academy in Colorado, President Obama asked rural gun owners and urban mothers to imagine having the opposite perspective on the need for weapons and the damage they can do.

headline.main: In a State That Knows the Gun Debate, the President Urges Both Sides to Listen
